content: between rounds 1 and 2 in the front of the dino shell in same stitch as slip_stitch skip a stitch slip_stitch x 6 if your shells are squished then skip two stitches instead of one special stitches shell bobble stitch 6 photos for reference front angle side group 7 thank you you are not allowed to sell the finished dinosaur they are for gifting/raock purposes only to get the rights to sell the finished dinosaur s you must purchase the pattern for $1 80 if you have any questions or need help you can message me on raverly fat dog crochet have you seen my crochet spider pattern it actually dispenses spider silk aka white yarn happy crocheting buy here 💚 kate and ollie
